title: Antarctic Vigil
creator_contributor_role: Dept of Interior for the Australian Film Board in association with The Australian National Anatarctic Research Expedition, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Heard Island (Heard and McDonald Islands)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australian Antarctic Territory (Antarctica)
abstract: A visit to the Antarctic outposts at Macquarie, Kerguelen and Heard Islands, showing the life and work of the men stationed there.
description: An account of research undertaken by Australian scientists at the Antarctic outposts of Macquarie, Kerguelen and Heard Islands. Shows life on these islands including work at the meteorological stations and studies of the unusual animal, bird and plant life found in Arctic regions.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002436; 100th Year Anniversary of Australian Antarctic Expeditions; Active; 2011
